summary: EVERYBODY STREET, directed by Cheryl Dunn, illuminates the lives and work of New York's iconic street photographers - including Bruce Davidson, Mary Ellen Mark, Elliott Erwitt, Ricky Powell... See full summary Â»
cast: Boogie|Martha Cooper|Bruce Davidson|Elliott Erwitt|Jill Freedman|Bruce Gilden|Max Kozloff|Rebecca Lepkoff|Mary Ellen Mark|Jeff Mermelstein|Joel Meyerowitz|Clayton Patterson|Ricky Powell|Luc Sante|Jamel Shabazz
title: Everybody Street
